info.author: Stefan "hr" Berder
info.description:
Sassy
=====

A full python SASS command line tool, syntax compatible with the original sass.

This project uses `python-scss <https://github.com/pistolero/python-scss>`_ to
have direct bindings to `libsass <http://libsass.org/>`_


Install
-------

::

    pip install sassy
info.name: sassy
info.summary: A full python SASS command line tool, syntax compatible with the original sass category of the content.
